sources.title: Beauty & The Beast | Full Movie | Epic Fantasy Drama | Estella Warren | Rhett Giles
sources.description:
Beauty & The Beast - A dark twist on the morality tale of forbidden love between beautiful Belle and the feared forest Beast. As villagers are brutally murdered and the Beast is hunted down as the one responsible for the mayhem, Belle and Beast team up to defeat the real killer; the power-hungry witch’s malevolent troll.
2010.  Stars: Estella Warren, Rhett Giles, Victor Parascos
